name: proyectogrado
description: Web app para anotar tweets de odio

scripts.seed_test_db: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_HOST="localhost" DB_USER="test" DB_PASS="test" DB_NAME="pgodio" node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run
scripts.test: cross-env DB_HOST="localhost" DB_USER="test" DB_PASS="test" DB_NAME="pgodio" SESSION_COOKIE_SECRET="secret" DEBUG=webapp:* node_modules/.bin/nodemon webapp/bin/www

author: Lucas Kunc
